facts.fact: Dave and Eileen once beat a crab and a lobster in a tag team wrestling match.
Dave and Eileen were once in an ill-fated band called The Suits.
Dave and Eileen have a totally awesome cat named Chairman Meow.
Dave and Eileen had their first date in Bali, Indonesia.
Dave wrote a song about Eileen for his old band before they started dating.
Dave and Eileen had their first kiss on New Years Eve.
Dave and Eileen sometimes write music together under the band name, Packets and Waves.
Dave and Eileen were both in the old Captain Planet cartoon back when they were childern (and cartoons).
If Dave and Eileen were a celebrity couple they would probably be crazy and intolerable.
Eileen is sometimes refered to as 'The Yoko Ono of The American Autumn'.
Dave and Eileen formed a 90's cover band called The Wonks while Eileen was in grad school.
